_xResult.title: Golden Sunset Blouse
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom mustard blouse with ruffles and emerald green accents
_xResult.longdesc:
This rich, mustard blouse in a creamy satin georgette evokes in us the feeling of relaxing to a magnificient sunset. It's dark enough to be warm and comforting and made of the softest, finest material. 

 

Featuring an emerald green, silk bow-tie closure as well as a thick row of ruffles, the garment truly oozes elegance and power. The sleeves feature a elasticated gather band of contrasting emerald green for a bit of extra flavor. 

 

The pictured blouse has a 3/4 length sleeve, hangs to your hips, and has a straight-cut fit. It does not feature any built-in customizations but as always, you may message Samshek using the "Contact Designer" button or by entering customization instructions into the box below to check if they can accommodate it.
